title: Deep Learning for Time Series Classification
abstract: Time Series Classification (TSC) is an important task and can be seen in multiple domains ranging from the medical field to human action recognition. In 2019, a review by Ismail Fawaz et al. for deep learning to solve this TSC problem was done. More recently, new state-of-the-art models such as InceptionTime have been proposed. All of the models are evaluated on the 128 datasets of the UCR archive . In this platform, we present all of the deep learning models for TSC evaluated on the UCR archive with four different visualization for their comparison. These comparison include a Critical Difference diagram, a Multi-Comparison Matrix, One-vs-One scatter plots and an efficiency comparison based on the number of parameters and FLOPS.
